## Regression

y - response, dependent

x_vector - independent, explanatory, features, inputs, predictors

y = f(x_vector)

y = f_hat(x_vector) + echelon (noise)

y_hat = b0 (y-intercept) + b1 (slope) * xi

ei = yi - y_hati

sum(ei^2)

lm(response ~ predictors, data = DF)
